mapper.insert: insert into team (num, name, late_start, late_interval, late_fee, late_max, late_maxFee, fee, board, admin, date) values (#{num}, #{name}, #{late_start}, #{late_interval}, #{late_fee}, #{late_max}, #{late_maxFee}, #{fee}, "notice, free", #{admin}, now())
mapper.select: select * from team order by num
